full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Welding and Painting Services for Lobster Cove Head Light Tower**

# Tender Details

### Tender Title
Welding and Painting Services for the Lobster Cove Head Light Tower

### Solicitation and Tender Number
30004676 (English), 30004676-R (French)

### Publication and Closing Dates
* Publication date: October 3, 2023
* Tender closing date: October 18, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

### Tender Status
This tender opportunity has expired.

### Notice Type
Invitation to Qualify - Competitive Traditional

### Contractors Requirements

Pêches et océans Canada (Fisheries and Oceans Canada) issued a tender for welding and painting services for the Lobster Cove Head Light Tower. The scope of work includes:

* Welding of cracks in the cast iron base of the tower
* Preparation and coating of the lower section of the tower with new paint (interior and exterior)
* Preparing and submitting a plan for pre-heat, welding, and post-heat for approval beforehand
* Installation of hoarding and heat if necessary

Contractors are required to submit their bid to Fisheries and Oceans Canada by October 18, 2023. The expected start date of the contract is November 5, 2023, with expected completion by December 31, 2023.

### Solicitation Documents

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21224/30004676-rfq.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21224/30004676-rfq-fr.pdf>

### Contact Information

Simon Cousineau (simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
(343) 548-1568

For inquiries regarding this tender opportunity, please contact Simon Cousineau at the above phone number or email address.

### Trade Agreements

This tender opportunity is subject to the requirements of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Only qualified contractors who meet the specified requirements will be allowed to bid on this project.
